short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor localStorage changes and show notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LocalStorage Watcher is a powerful Chrome extension designed to monitor and track changes in localStorage across all websites you visit. This tool is perfect for developers, QA testers, and anyone interested in understanding how websites interact with local storage.
